nodes.text: The Honeymoon Palace was a building on the planet Naboo during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. It catered to newly-wed couples on their honeymoon.

The Honeymoon Palace was first mentioned in the conversation "A Modest Proposal" with Doc, a companion character for the Jedi Knight class in the 2011 BioWare video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. If female Knights refuse Doc's proposal of marriage, he informs them that he will have to cancel his reservation.
